contexts.context: .... Ashlanders hunt for game here, and their herds find sparse <mark>grazing</mark>. It rains rarely, and suffers frequent ash storms....
...regular rain and dark soils of the Grazelands produce the rich <mark>grazing</mark> for Ashlander herds that give the region its name. The...
...camp move their herds across the plains in search of fresh <mark>grazing</mark>. There are no roads or tracks, but travel is...
...near Balmora. The herds of the Ashlanders of Urshilaku camp <mark>graze</mark> on the sparse but hardy highland vegetation.
